item.title: Abandoned sofa., 1st January
item.description:
Sofa has been abandoned. This sofa was previously outside no 33 Oakhouse Road. it does not show up on our ring doorbell, as too far away (we live opposite) but the bin men may well remember it being there during the last month.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Latham Road, Bexley, Greater London

item.title: 2/3ft. Very large pothole in road causing damage to cars and noise levels are extreme when any vehicle drives over it., 1st January
item.description:
The pothole has been there for over 10 years and keeps bringing repaired only to return even worse on every occasion. It’s directly outside no. 9 and 10. Quite worrying that it keeps reappearing bigger than before. Is it a sinkhole or water damage.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, East Wickham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Terrible sight at main entrance Edison house, 1st January
item.description:
Extremely unhygenic and uncivilised appearence looks worse than the worst possible areas of the world. It's Bern like this for two to three days already. And it's a recurring issue. Residents throw and dump waste and removal of waste us not as frequent as it should be with fewer bins. Also big items are trashed. It's very harmful for the image of Southwark and thus locality. Any visitors or passers by can see this is perhaps the worst neighbourhood and its a shame to live in this building for my family.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Kent Road, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
